channel.title: [PI] Control Panel
channel.description:
I tried using a guide I found on RuneServer to add a CP to my server and I got these errors. It was Robgob's guide, FYI.
[code]src\server\util\ControlPanel.java:34: error: cannot find symbol private PanelSettings settings = null; ^ symbol: class PanelSettings location: class ControlPanel src\server\util\ControlPanel.java:36: error: cannot find symbol public PanelSettings settings() { ^ symbol: class PanelSettings location: class ControlPanel src\server\util\PanelSettings.java:11: error: cannot find symbol private ControlPanel p; ^ symbol: class ControlPanel location: class PanelSettings src\server\util\PanelSettings.java:12: error: cannot find symbol public PanelSettings(ControlPanel p) { ^ symbol: class ControlPanel location: class PanelSettings src\server\util\ControlPanel.java:47: error: cannot find symbol settings = new PanelSettings(this); ^ symbol: class PanelSettings location: class ControlPanel src\server\util\PanelSettings.java:364: error: cannot find symbol Connection.addNameToBanList(c.playerName); ^ symbol: variable Connection location: class PanelSettings src\server\util\PanelSettings.java:365: error: cannot find symbol Connection.addNameToFile(c.playerName); ^ symbol: variable Connection location: class PanelSettings src\server\util\PanelSettings.java:370: error: cannot find symbol Connection.addIpToBanList(c.connectedFrom); ^ symbol: variable Connection location: class PanelSettings src\server\util\PanelSettings.java:371: error: cannot find symbol Connection.addIpToFile(c.connectedFrom); ^ symbol: variable Connection location: class PanelSettings src\server\util\PanelSettings.java:377: error: cannot find symbol Connection.addNameToMuteList(c.playerName); ^ symbol: variable Connection location: class PanelSettings src\server\util\PanelSettings.java:381: error: cannot find symbol Connection.addIpToMuteList(c.connectedFrom); ^ symbol: variable Connection location: class PanelSettings Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 11 errors Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
